New Records: Dunith Wellalage became the first spinner to take five wickets in an ODI against India on more than one occasion.
Sri Lanka won the series after a gap of 27 years, since 1997.
Key Match Events: Sri Lanka defeated India by 110 runs.
Key wickets fell including Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli.
Debutant Riyan Parag performed well in his first ODI match.
Charith Asalanka's leadership and strategy were pivotal to Sri Lanka's win.
Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted India as the favorites given their home advantage.
Captain Charith Asalanka won the toss and decided to bat first.
Rohit Sharma emphasized the need for India to review their performance post-match.
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed pride in the team's resilience.
Charith Asalanka celebrated the series win and the team's effort.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Spin bowlers played a significant role in the match outcome.
Several Sri Lankan players were injured, affecting their lineup strength.
The match was a historical win for Sri Lanka against India in an ODI series.
Others: Live updates throughout the match provided a comprehensive view of the game's progression.
